# isOpen

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the outline object is initially disclosed.

## Declaration

```swift
var isOpen: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Calling `isOpen` on an outline object that has no children always returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. Calling `isOpen` on the root outline object always returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].
title: isOpen
